Can you give me some hints as to what you were doing?

I think I was testing Object Searching, Selected object view open, System 
Objects view open, some Details view open, and generally clicking around
seeing relationships, different filters.

I can't reproduce this but I don't know how to prove that this is fixed because 
there is no test case for this.  If you see it again, please reopen with a 
detailed description.
